extendedInfo.description: Stocks Widget showing sliding tickers like the NYSE / CNBC tape !The tape displays your own stocks or the top movers from the following indexes:- Dow Jones (DJIA)- Nasdaq 100- StockTwits 50- S&P 500- TSX (Canada)- DAX (Germany)- CAC 40 (France)- IBEX (Spain)- MIB (Italy)- SMI (Switzerland)- AEX (Netherlands)- BEL 20 (Belgium)- ATX (Austria)- PSI (Portugal)- HSI (Hong-Kong)- Bovespa (Brazil)- SENSEX (India)Some lists have been added as requested by users:- BRIC ADRs- Chinese ADRs- S&P Sectors- Main world indexes- STI (Singapore)- RTS (Russia)- Commodities- Currency pairs (USD, EUR, JPY, GBP, AUD, CAD, CHF)- Topix Core 30 (major Japanese stocks)*** Widget still under development, work-in-progress ! It does not work yet on some tablets, sorry ****** 20 free logs in this free trial version, get the PRO version if you like this widget, Thank You ****** THIS IS A WIDGET : You need a FULL LINE on your homescreen to be able to display this widget ****** How to display this WIDGET ? Long Click on your homescreen => select 'Widget' => select 'Android Stocks Tape Widget'*** WARNING:The Widget can be jittery on some phones (not scrolling smoothly/framerate problems) depending on the model/brand of your phoneThe Widget can made navigation in your home screens choppy/frustrating (screen switching can be done by using the icons/bullets at the bottom left and right of your home screen, instead of swiping left or right)The Widget is not working so well on funds, it works better for stocks.

reviews.title: Galaxy S4
reviews.comment: I like the look & ease of use about this app. Unfortunately it is not very stable on the Galaxy S4. Everytime I open the \"WatchOn\" native app this app stops and gives error message. Please fix for 5 stars.
reviews.author: Jason Miklitsch

reviews.title: Could be better
reviews.comment: Did no like. I had to delete my ticker widget daily and redo it.  Not worth my tine  Should be free up to 4 stock symbols.  Not worth $4
reviews.author: JIm Hribnak

reviews.title: Any way to change or remove \'watch list\' title?
reviews.comment: Great widget.  The only issue I have with it is that when you set display mode to Tickers only, it places a title (e.g. Dow Jones, or Watch List) along with the refresh time at the bottom of the widget.  I wish there were a way to remove this.  Otherwise, great widget.  Can you clarify on the Play Store page the features added by upgrading to Pro?  What does 20 free logs mean?  I\'ll buy Pro if it adds additional features that I like.
reviews.author: Travis Robertson

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: Exactly what I want... A scrolling ticker widget with a transparent background on my main screen (4 x 1). Great job!
reviews.author: J. roto

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy S III
reviews.comment: Love the ticker widget. Lets me see what I need without showing the stuff I\'m not interested in seeing. Refreshes automatically at intervals of my choosing and allows me to manage wifi and data sepately or together. Haven\'t found any bugs yet on either Samsung device. Simply put, it meets needs to a tea. Thanks so much for thia app & your hard work.  :)
reviews.author: Ivan Troncoso

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: I was looking dis type of app long tym ago, honestly speaks that awesome n very helpful app for all stock related person.must watch n share ,  Thxs
reviews.author: Zeeshan Ahmad

reviews.title: Better than many others
reviews.comment: I have tried so many apps on market but never commented on any neither given any ratings. This app has such a quality. Try yourself to know.
reviews.author: Nishit Sinha

reviews.title: Nice, but crashed and have to re-do
reviews.comment: I like it but it crashed and you have to start all over. Also, wish ticker could scroll across even faster. Please fix and i will consider purchasing! Galaxy s3 .
reviews.author: Peter Tran

reviews.title: Works Great.
reviews.comment: Wish it had an option for slightly faster updating refresh... like 1 minute, but overall a great and simple app.... I\'m just being picky.  :-)
reviews.author: Bryan Lane

reviews.title: Pretty good app!!!
reviews.comment: It does what out is supposed to :D
reviews.author: Marvin Nelson

reviews.title: Good widget
reviews.comment: Easy customization, worked well
reviews.author: Chris Kateyiannis

reviews.title: Nice & buggy
reviews.comment: I want to buy this one, but only if you start updating the app regularly again.
reviews.author: Thomas Andersen

reviews.title: Good app does the job.
reviews.comment: Would be nice if you could watch commodities like gold and silver as well.
reviews.author: Tim Wollin

reviews.title: Not enough
reviews.comment: I installed this app yesterday afternoon, this morning 2 hours prior to market open my trail version expires??  Not even near enough time to evaluate all the details and options prior to purchase.  The whole point of a trial version, this app is very good (so far) however I was not afforded enough time to really tell...nice sales strategy, just cost you 1 sale.
reviews.author: Mykel Z

reviews.comment: Works well, simple, and easy!
reviews.author: Jingshun Lim

reviews.title: Why no commodity personalization?
reviews.comment: Great app but why am I unable to personalize commodities by searching? Would consider purchasing if I knew this was available
reviews.author: Nicholas Scates

reviews.title: Good widget, could be better...
reviews.comment: Decent features, but only allows 5 custom ticker symbols in the free version.
reviews.author: Will McGowan

reviews.title: Oppurtunity For Improvement
reviews.comment: Downloaded the app and I noticed some areas of improvement, in terms of turning off/on my Galaxy S2 HD LTE the Android Stock Tape will not load. The display shows a wrench/hammer a play button and a gear... Something like that.   In order to refresh the scrolling tape, I have to remove my existing customized tapes and go back into the app and reselect the tapes. Hopefully this helps in terms of making this app more user friendly for the folks
reviews.author: Imran Hajee

reviews.title: Great app u can download .
reviews.comment: U can download it for market watch.but only five stocks limit.totally every thing was fine.
reviews.author: Shiva Krishna

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: App was just what I was looking for, stock widget so I don\'t have to open apps to check stocks, because its right there on my home screen. :D
reviews.author: Spec Fo
